4.5 Building an Automation controller application

4.5.1 Initializing OLE Automation

Before using any OLE Automation facilities, a controller application should call the function OLE-initialize, page 214. This function ensures that the Microsoft OLE/COM libraries have been initialized on the local machine.

The number of calls to this function must be balanced by the same number of calls to the function OLE-uninitialize, page 215.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
